title: Daybreak in Udi
creator_credit: Crown Film Unit and Central Office of Information
brief_description: The Abaja Ibos, with the advice of the District Officer, in the Udi division of Nigeria, build a maternity home and show how ancient prejudices are overcome in the development of their territory.
creator_credit_for_label: Crown Film Unit and Central Office of Information
